name: V.P.S.C (Very.Particular.Space.Citizen) #2 – Bernie Brainy
description: [V.P.S.C (Very.Particular.Space.Citizen) #2 – Bernie Brainy]   Portrait of a very particular Space Citizen.   32 years old, fifth lobotomy. It became a habit. A barrier ? A lobotomy. Now he seems really serene and proud to be able to show it to everyone.   120 frames 3D animation loop by @Mosieur_Costard
